ActorTalk: Yeah, I overheard what Ed told you.
One night after closing, I saw him just standing there staring at the sink, completely zoned out.
We're already understaffed, so he's under a ton of pressure. And now with those thugs showing up, we can't really do much to help...
But when I tried to comfort him, he looked up and saidâ€”
"Even if I'm no longer the manager of Kuroro Coffee, please keep serving everyone the best drinks you can, okay?"
I was actually hoping to ask about Ross, too.
Just keeping the cafe running is already a huge help to him.
